unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Traffic Rules Got You Scratching Your Head?**
normalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Traffic Rules Got You Scratching Your Head?**

unnormalised: Bangalore traffic, already a legendary headache, just got a fresh twist! New regulations are rolling out, and folks are buzzing about it more than the aroma of biryani on a Sunday.
normalised: Bangalore traffic, already a legendary headache, just got a fresh twist! New regulations are rolling out, and folks are buzzing about it more than the aroma of biryani on a Sunday.

unnormalised: First up, fines for signal jumping are reportedly skyrocketing – think Rs. 5000 for a first offense. Yikes! And forget about that quick chai stop while parked illegally; they're cracking down hard on parking violations, especially near MG Road.
normalised: First up, fines for signal jumping are reportedly skyrocketing – think rupee five thousand for a first offense. Yikes! And forget about that quick chai stop while parked illegally; they're cracking down hard on parking violations, especially near M G Road.

unnormalised: Authorities from the Transport Department of Karnataka are also pushing for stricter enforcement of helmet rules for pillion riders. Apparently, it's not just the driver who needs to protect their head these days.
normalised: Authorities from the Transport Department of Karnataka are also pushing for stricter enforcement of helmet rules for pillion riders. Apparently, it's not just the driver who needs to protect their head these days.

unnormalised: Driving during Onam festivities? Double-check your license and registration, folks. Expect increased police presence and more checkpoints around major cities.
normalised: Driving during Onam festivities? Double-check your license and registration, folks. Expect increased police presence and more checkpoints around major cities.

unnormalised: Hefty fines are also being introduced for those tampering with emission control systems, aiming to make our air a little cleaner.
normalised: Hefty fines are also being introduced for those tampering with emission control systems, aiming to make our air a little cleaner.

unnormalised: Rumors are flying about mandatory driving refresher courses for repeat offenders.
normalised: Rumors are flying about mandatory driving refresher courses for repeat offenders.

unnormalised: So, buckle up (literally!), brush up on those road rules, and drive safe, especially this festive season! Let's keep the roads safe and avoid those hefty challans. After all, no one wants a traffic fine to ruin their Onam celebrations!
normalised: So, buckle up (literally!), brush up on those road rules, and drive safe, especially this festive season! Let's keep the roads safe and avoid those hefty challans. After all, no one wants a traffic fine to ruin their Onam celebrations!
